CustomField.formula: CASE( RecordType.DeveloperName ,'InternalEmployee', HYPERLINK($Label.Sample_Request_Form_URL+'?Id=' + Id,'Form URL' ,'_blank'),'Decor24_Samples', HYPERLINK($Label.Decor_URL+'?Id=' + Id,'Form URL' ,'_blank'),'Website_Samples', HYPERLINK($Label.WebSite_Form_URL+'?Id=' + Id,'Form URL' ,'_blank'),'')
CustomField.label: Sample Form Url
